channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: The Caller
channel.desc: Mary, a divorcee, discovers an antique telephone and sets it up in her new apartment. However, things get complicated when she receives mysterious and disturbing phone calls from the past.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Beast of Burden
channel.desc: A group of animals called thoriphants are tired of being slaves. Later, they go on a dangerous trip to find a special city where they think they'll be free.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days
channel.desc: Stella Olemaun moves to Los Angeles to create awareness about vampires, but soon becomes the target of the local blood-thirsty demons. She decides to face them and avenge her husband's death.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta
channel.desc: Chris Redfield teams up with Leon S Kennedy, a DSO agent, and Rebecca Chambers, a professor, to track down Glenn Arias, a death merchant, who wants to unleash a deadly virus in New York City.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Awakenings
channel.desc: When Dr Malcolm Sayer discovers a cure for an epidemic, numerous catatonic patients get a second chance to live. However, the cure eventually leads to more complications.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Vanguard
channel.desc: Qin, an accountant living in the UK, is targeted by the leader of a terrorist organisation. His only hope for survival is Vanguard, an elite security company.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: 30 Days of Night: Dark Days
channel.desc: Stella Olemaun moves to Los Angeles to create awareness about vampires, but soon becomes the target of the local blood-thirsty demons. She decides to face them and avenge her husband's death.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Life
channel.desc: As astronauts discover the first evidence of extra-terrestrial life on Mars, they begin realising that the life form is extremely intelligent and hostile.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: War of the Arrows
channel.desc: Orphaned siblings are raised by their father's close friend. When one is abducted before her wedding, the other courageously stands against the formidable Mongols.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Redbelt
channel.desc: A ju-jitsu instructor, Mike Terry, who tries to make ends meet, refuses to compete in the ring. He is forced to return to the ring in order to raise money after his debts mount.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Monkey King: The One And Only
channel.desc: On a quest to retrieve Buddhist sutras, Tang Sanzang and disciples encounter a fox named Xiaoqi in a village. Later, her brother schemes to harm Tang's group, hoping to extend the fox's life.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Midnight Special
channel.desc: Alton has strange powers. His dad, Roy, takes him from a cult. The government also wants him. They all chase Roy and Alton to a destiny date.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: John Wick: Chapter 2
channel.desc: Renowned assassin John Wick sets out for Rome to duel with some of the deadliest killers to fulfil a vow he made. However, he soon learns that there is a huge bounty on his head.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Fury
channel.desc: Towards the end of the Second World War, Don Collier, a tank commander, is pushed to make tough decisions for the survival of his crew as they fight their way across Germany.

channel.name: And Flix IN
channel.title: Naked Weapon
channel.desc: When 40 young girls are kidnapped, a CIA is put in charge of the case but he does not get any leads. Later, a series of assassinations makes him suspect a connection between the cases.
